author: Staff Reporter
text: Transport Minister P. Thangamani consoled the accident victims at the Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital (KGMCH) on Thursday night. As per the directions of the Chief Minister, Jayalalithaa, the Minister visited the injured persons at the hospital along with former minister N. Thalavai Sundaram and Nagercoil MLA A. Nanjil Murugesan. Dean S. Vadivel Murugan explained the treatment given to the accident victims. Collector Sajjansingh R. Chavan accompanied the Minister.
title: Minister calls on accident victims
